215788.name: A New Day Dawns on Weeping Willow
215788.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Highfolk Introductory Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

A small hamlet, Weeping Willow, has suffered more than its share of tragedy. Now just as it seems that peace and prosperity might return, a small band of heroes stumbles across a fight that threatens to destabilize the region. Will the adventurers discover what secrets lie in Weeping Willow? How will they steer the future of the region?

An introductory adventure set in Highfolk for 1st level characters.

rpgseries: HIG - Living Greyhawk Highfolk Regional Adventures
215789.name: Finding My Way
215789.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Highfolk Introductory Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

Some people know which way they are going with certainty and never change. Others have change thrust upon them and need some guidance to rein in their enthusiasm.

A one-round Highfolk Introductory Regional adventure set in the Highvale.

rpgseries: GEO - Living Greyhawk Geoff Regional Adventure
215790.name: Grand Duchy of Geoff
215790.description:
From the introduction:

The Flan are the native people of the Flanaess, the portion of Oerth in which Living Greyhawk is set. Geoff is the only civilized nation to continue the practice of the Old Ways of the Flan, albeit with Oeridian and Suloise influences. Its rough landscape is especially well suited to the rugged Flan and their ways.

215791.name: The Sivatag Desert
215791.description:
(user summary)

A drag-and-drop desert for all of your fantasy games. From the Jigsaw Fantasy Patreon.

215792.name: The Reckoning
215792.description:
Publisher's blurb:

The Reckoning is a complete Underdark Campaign. There is enough material for approximately 15 full days of gaming with any gaming group. The adventure contains pre-generated player characters in modifiable PDF files, complete character backgrounds, and it is playable with relatively little preparation on the part of the Dungeon Master and players.

While designed as an evil campaign with all Drow protagonists, the only overtly evil act that the PCs are required to commit is an attack on an Elven village at the climax. Appendix C presents an alternative storyline which is suitable for good aligned adventurers.

User summary:

Distributed as a 95-page PDF scenario and four 3-page pre-generated characters.

215793.name: Out of the Pan
215793.description:
Power Outage Adventure Block

From the introduction:

A well respected scientist has been encased and carried off. Meanwhile citizens of Atomnyy Zavod are being transformed into an Army of Breakfast items! Do your heroes have the true grits to take on this Eggciting challenge? Or will Break Fast make them Toast!?

User summary:

For levels 1 through 4.

215794.name: Trading Spaces
215794.description:
Power Outage Adventure Block

From the introduction:

Robotic henchman are ransacking small shops leaving valuables and stealing assortments of mechanical and technological components. But what are these insignificant parts for? And which diabolical villain could make use of them?

User summary:

For levels 1 through 4.

215795.name: Unkindness of Ravens
215795.description:
"Out of curiosity... Amelio Gonzolez... stuck a flaming candle... in the protruding ear of... Maria Sanchez... and smiled wickedly."

Uncover an act most cruel by revealing six story elements that together describe the treachery and spell the word UNKIND.

Careful though, your opponents are equally devilish, so you'll need to use your letters, corvid tokens, and perhaps summon a black raven to stop them. 2 to 5 players and plays in about 20 minutes.

The Corvid Tokens can also be used to expand your options and deepen your strategy in Murder of Crows.

OBJECTIVE:
Be the first player to spell the word UNKIND in front of you and then read the Act Most Cruel along the bottom of the cards aloud to win.

PLAY:
On your turn you draw 1 card and play 1 card in front of you in order to spell the word UNKIND.

When played, a card's ability is activated:

Undo: Pick a player, they must return the last card they played into their Unkind to their hand.
Need: Draw 1 card and 1 corvid.
Kill: Remove one letter from an opponent’s UNKIND
Investigate: Draw 2 corvid Tokens, then look at a player's hand.
Drag: Collect 1 corvid Token from another player.




Alternatively, a player can acquire a Corvid Token:

When casting a spell, a player may instead draw a corvid token. Spell does not occur.
When drawing a card, a player may instead draw a corvid token.




Countering Card Abilities:
When a card is played, another player may prevent its effect from affecting them (alone) by discarding a card from their hand. The discarded card must have the same number of Crows in the top left corner as the card played.

Using Corvid Tokens

When playing a letter card, a player may spend corvid token(s), to increase the crow value of the card by 1 crow per token.
When countering a spell, a player may spend corvid token(s), to increase or decrease the crow value of the card by 1 crow per token.
Before ending their turn, a player may place corvid token(s) on any empty letter spot(s) in another player’s UNKIND. Players may add to spots with corvid token(s), but no letter spot may every contain more than 5 corvid token.




Corvid Tokens in your Murder

When there is one or more corvid tokens in your murder, you may only play a letter card into that spot if you over come the total number of Birds in the spot. The player can do this with just a letter card, or it may require additional crows added to the card (An empty spot with 5 corvid tokens, could be removed with a 3 Crow Letter card and 3 corvid tokens). Once overcome, all the corvid tokens are removed.
A Wild Crow/Raven card may be placed in a empty spot regardless of corvid tokens. The corvid tokens are all removed.




Wild Ravens Cards
In Unkindness of Ravens, each Raven card has a unique ability written on the card.

215796.name: Spank the Yeti: The Adult Party Game of Questionable Decisions
215796.description:
Description from the publisher:
"Would you dumpster hump a robot, eat the dingleberries of a coked-out unicorn, and joust Tarzan? Or, maybe you would hump the unicorn, joust the robot, and snack on Tarzan's dingleberries?!

Spank the Yeti is inspired by the popular parlor game, F*ck, Marry, Kill. Each round, one player pairs up three Action Cards with three Object Cards (people, creatures, and things), and the other players try to correctly predict his or her answers. You don’t really know your friends until you know whose dingleberries they'd eat."

215797.name: The Guild Bulletin - (Volume 3, Number 2, Issue #9, March 1994
215797.description: A magazine produced for the Shenandoah Valley Gamers Guild

215798.name: Dream Home: Promo Tokens – Christmas Tree
215798.description:
The Christmas tree is a décor token.

You may place it in a room consisting of two or three cards (not including the garage). You can have only one Christmas tree in your home. The standard décor rules apply otherwise.

To get a Christmas tree, after you take the pair of cards from the column of your choice, discard the resource card and replace it with the available Christmas tree token with the most points.

215800.description:
Rob Markham returns with 12 Battles from the Age of Chivalry. Using his famous R&R system, updated and modified for these battles. The battles included are:

Hastings
Lincoln
Bouvines
Marchfield
Stamford Bridge
Kalaura
Bannockburn
Lake Peipus
Legnano
Leignitz
Virkov
Brunkeberg

Of medium complexity, rated a 4 on a scale of 1 to 10, 10 being hardest, the game is well suited to solitaire play. Recommended for ages 12 and above.

Projected Contents:
12x 22x17 full-color maps
6x full-color, die-cut, counter sheets of half-inch counters
1x Rules Booklets
1x Scenario Booklet
Charts and Tables
Dice
215800.name: Battles from the Age of Chivalry

215801.description:
Lore.
...Your Shieldbearer falls, shield broken and stomach pierced by the Sword of the opposing champion. You move your Archer into the frontline – Encouraged by your Priestess, he shoots an arrow at the Magician, covered against melee attacks. With an arrow in his chest, he falls. You watch as the Warlord frowns at the result. The loss of his Magician was not part of his plan. Desperately, he orders his Conqueror to battle to face your Monk

With an empowered, overwhelming strike your Monk puts the Conqueror in the grave, exposing the opposing strategist. Rising to the occasion enters your Champion. He charges the Strategist and with a single swing of his sword the Strategist – The Savages only hope – is decapitated, securing your victory. Icosara is yours.

Game Concept
Edge Is a tabletop card game where two players wage war on each other using cards, dices and tactical formations. The game has a heavy emphasis on strategy and calculated tactics and plays both like a boardgame and a living card game.

It is very easy to get into the game and the rules seem almost simple, but don't let that fool you. The more you get play it, the more advanced formations you and your opponent will come up with.
Through different tactics and different setups, you will delve into the over 14.000 different ways to set up your army.

Though playing it gives a similar vibe, Edge is not Magic or even a rework of the game. No more arguing about obscure rules or different versions of the same. This game combines elements and inspiration from multiple games, that most gamers will recognize, but the mechanics are utilized in such a way that the game forms it's own new genre.

So choose your tactics and strategy!
How will you choose to play and how will you ensure victory? Do you want to charge at your opponent with brute force, or do you want to slowly lure him into your traps to weaken him before the deathblow. The choice is yours.

Goal of the Game
Most points win!
So in the normal game you will need to accumulate more points then your opponent in a 2 matchs/battles setup.
There are variants but even for those most points win

Resources
This game as stated in the game concept, is about resources. your card/pawns, dices, re-rolls and everything else is a limited resource and you will need to think about when and when not to use them or you will quickly find yourself with any way to protect your army and lose.
215801.name: Edge: Clans of Icosara

215803.name: Panama (パナマ)
215803.description:
User summary
パナマ (Panama) is a investment card game for 4 players only, which uses a deck of traditional playing cards and 20 card stands made with a 3D printer. The rules are available in Japanese and English. (In Japan, the standard deck of Western playing cards is known as a 'Trump' deck. Hence the designer explaining the game as a 'Trump Extension' game.)

Cards numbered A, 2, 3, 4, 5, and two jokers are investment cards. Five cards each are dealt to the players. Cards numbered 6-10 are tax haven cards. Players try to earn positive tax haven cards by playing investing cards.

When you invest on a tax haven card, you place a card stand along a border of the tax haven card and insert an investment card you want to play, so that one player cannot see how much you invest. Up to four players can invest on a tax haven card, and the highest investor earns the face value of that tax haven card. But one pre-determined suit counts negative, and a joker also inverts the sign if involved. You should speculate about hidden cards and try to let negative points go to other investors.

You can co-operate with one of other players by sharing complete information about what you play. But to win the game, you have to part ways in the end.

Jacks, Queens, and King are agent card. Each player has one of these at the beginning of a game, and can use it once for one shot effect, such as reversing order or skipping a player.

Publisher's summary
トランプ拡張ゲーム「パナマ」

トランプ(Playing Card)を
・投資カード　・タックスヘイブンカード　・工作員カード
に分け、場に出されたタックスヘイブンカードの周囲を
投資カードを付属のカードスタンドで立てていき、点数を稼いでいきます。
情報漏洩事務所(Panama paper office)への投資は減点となるため、他人におしつけます。
トランプを立てて置くと、４人の内１人からは必ず絵柄が見えなくなるため
プレイヤーは常に誰を騙すか選択することになります。
協調することで点は増えますが、最終的には出し抜いて１位を目指します。

215804.name: Treasure Keeper's Screen
rpg: Blood & Treasure Fantasy Role Playing Game
215804.description:
From publisher blurb:

Blood & Treasure is the fantasy role-playing game for people who want to spend less time arguing over rules and more time playing, and the new 2nd Edition continues this tradition.

And while the game is rules lite and options heavy there are a few tables of data in the game that a Treasure Keeper might need to reference during play. Hence - the Blood & Treasure 2nd Edition Treasure Keeper's Screen.

Just print it out and insert the panels in your favorite plastic screen and voila, you have tables to help you run your game, and a place to hide your evil smile when the players stumble into one of your carefully laid dungeon traps!

The screen features old school art by Denis McCarthy, a table of weapons, attack and saving throw values for all the classes, item saving throws, ability score modifiers, light sources, movement rates, adept spells per day, the turn undead table, and tables concerning special maneuvers, evading monsters, disease, poison and wounds.

215805.name: White Box Gothic: Adventures in Horror & Shadow
215805.description:
From publisher blurb:

"Alone with the dead, I dare not go out!"

White Box Gothic brings gothic horror to your Swords & Wizardry WhiteBox campaign! Inside this terrible tome you'll find a horde of horrors!

Six New Classes: From the deadly Monster Hunter to the damned Dhampir.
Thirty New Spells: Speak with the dead, defile the land, and bind spirits to your service!
Twenty-Five New Magic Items: Draw undead servants from your Bag of Bones, learn the secrets of the Book of the Damned, and draw hope from the Symbol of Piety!
Fifteen New Monsters: The lowly Cultist, the mysterious Breath Stealer, to the powerful Vampire Lord!
Optional Rules: Corruption, Dread, and laying Curses!




Inside these fifty pages you'll find all manner of dark and dire secrets to vex your players and defy the undead!

215806.description:
In IKAN, one of the players uses tiles to create a 5x5 labyrinth, with the labyrinth having an opening where the hero enters, a treasure, a monster, and some items that the hero needs to find. The other players watch the labyrinth being built and have a few seconds after it's finished to memorize everything, then the labyrinth is hidden from view. The dungeon maker starts a timer, then the players try to move their hero through the labyrinth by giving directions: "Go straight, turn left, go straight again." "Okay, you just picked up the key." "Now we turn around..."

The players must locate the treasure, pick up a weapon and slay the monster, then escape from the labyrinth without running out of time.
215806.name: IKAN

215807.description:
Zagor: Odissea Americana: Trampy Promo Card is one of a set of 4 event cards to be added to those in the Zagor: Odissea Americana base game. The cards are simply shuffled in with the base game cards, adding more variety from game to game.

The first 3 italian versions of the cards (Molti occhi, Trampy and Icaro La Plume) were given to the visitors of Lucca Comics & Games 2016, a comics & gameplay festival in Lucca in 2016, and later during other promotional events with the 4th card (Insidie sul fiume). It's one of the first additional cards for the Italian edition of Zagor: Odissea Americana.

Text:

Trampy
Cico non tira dadi azione. Nota: Sacrifica un dado azione giocatore
Cico does not roll any action die. Note: Sacrifice one action player die
215807.name: Zagor: Odissea Americana – Trampy Promo Card

215808.description:
Zagor: Odissea Americana: Icaro La Plume Promo Card is one of a set of 4 event cards to be added to those in the Zagor: Odissea Americana base game. The cards are simply shuffled in with the base game cards, adding more variety from game to game.

The first 3 italian versions of the cards (Molti occhi, Trampy and Icaro La Plume) were given to the visitors of Lucca Comics & Games 2016, a comics & gameplay festival in Lucca in 2016, and later during other promotional events with the 4th card (Insidie sul fiume). It's one of the first additional cards for the Italian edition of Zagor: Odissea Americana.

Text:

Icaro La Plume
Quando entra in gioco, Icaro La Plume viene preso dal timoniere. Puoi associarlo a un movimento per spostarti in qualunque spazio. Dopo averlo usato, passa Icaro La Plume a un altro giocatore. Nota: Questo evento non può essere scartato
When it comes into play, Icarus La Plume is taken by the helmsman. You can associate it with a movement to move in any space. After using it, pass Icarus La Plume to another player. Note: This event can not be discarded
215808.name: Zagor: Odissea Americana – Icaro La Plume Promo Card

215809.name: Game Hunter
215809.description:
From publisher blurb:

Hunter of the Deadliest Game

Thimba Jabari, TV celebrity, hunter, and enemy of the Recluse! When he vowed to take down the arachnid vigilante, he was humiliated in front of the world.

Having now lost his show, and his status, Jabari turned to a witch who gave him the strength, speed, and power of the Spirit of Lion. With his new powers, Thimba battles Recluse as Game Hunter (PL 9).

Super Powered Legends. Because sometimes what you need is a character everyone will recognize, even if they’ve never met her before.

215810.name: Lanthorn (System Neutral Edition)
215810.description:
From publisher blurb:

High up in the mountains, and often besieged by packs of murderous trolls, the village of Lanthorn stands as civilisation’s last glimmering light in an otherwise bleak and barren mountain range. A strange alliance of wizards—the Grand Conclave of Sublime Artificers—and a gaggle of (almost) civilised goblins—the Flaming Skull tribe—dwells in a bizarre atmosphere that is both scholarly and anarchic. Protected by high walls and gigantic magical lanterns imbued with portent fire magic, the wizards craft the mundane and wondrous items for which they are famed. Without the walls brave—or foolhardy—goblin “miners” search the nearby troll-haunted mines for lead and silver—some of which is reputed to have magical properties.

215811.name: Lanthorn (Pathfinder)
215811.description:
From publisher blurb:

High up in the mountains, and often besieged by packs of murderous trolls, the village of Lanthorn stands as civilisation’s last glimmering light in an otherwise bleak and barren mountain range. A strange alliance of wizards—the Grand Conclave of Sublime Artificers—and a gaggle of (almost) civilised goblins—the Flaming Skull tribe—dwells in a bizarre atmosphere that is both scholarly and anarchic. Protected by high walls and gigantic magical lanterns imbued with portent fire magic, the wizards craft the mundane and wondrous items for which they are famed. Without the walls brave—or foolhardy—goblin “miners” search the nearby troll-haunted mines for lead and silver—some of which is reputed to have magical properties.

215812.name: Lanthorn (5E)
215812.description:
From publisher blurb:

High up in the mountains, and often besieged by packs of murderous trolls, the village of Lanthorn stands as civilisation’s last glimmering light in an otherwise bleak and barren mountain range. A strange alliance of wizards—the Grand Conclave of Sublime Artificers—and a gaggle of (almost) civilised goblins—the Flaming Skull tribe—dwells in a bizarre atmosphere that is both scholarly and anarchic. Protected by high walls and gigantic magical lanterns imbued with portent fire magic, the wizards craft the mundane and wondrous items for which they are famed. Without the walls brave—or foolhardy—goblin “miners” search the nearby troll-haunted mines for lead and silver—some of which is reputed to have magical properties.

215813.description:
Zagor: Odissea Americana: Insidie sul fiume Promo Card is one of a set of 4 event cards to be added to those in the Zagor: Odissea Americana base game. The cards are simply shuffled in with the base game cards, adding more variety from game to game.

The first 3 italian versions of the cards (Molti occhi, Trampy and Icaro La Plume) were given to the visitors of Lucca Comics & Games 2016, a comics & gameplay festival in Lucca in 2016, and later during other promotional events with this card (Insidie sul fiume). It's one of the first additional cards for the Italian edition of Zagor: Odissea Americana.

Text:

Insidie sul fiume / Perils on the river
Scopri i pericoli dietro il battello. Ogni giocatore può pagare un gettone (simbolo) per scartare un pericolo. Se restano almeno:
due eventi: rimuovi segnalino scafo (simbolo) più a destra
una pianta carnivora: il battello subisce danno (simbolo) pari alla velocità attuale
una rapida: avanza il battello di uno spazio e svuota la cambusa
Find out the dangers behind the boat. Each player can pay a token (symbol) to discard a danger. If there are at least:
two events: remove the rightmost hull marker (symbol)
a carnivorous plant: the boat takes damage (symbol) equal to the current speed
rapids: the boat moves forward one space and empties caboose
215813.name: Zagor: Odissea Americana – Insidie sul fiume Promo Card

215814.name: Students of Lore and Magic, Optional Spell-Casting Rules
215814.description:
From publisher blurb:

While spell-casters prove a powerful and invaluable ally in an adventuring party, there are many times that players choose other options and you end up missing a vital functionary within the party. Options generally run from providing NPC support or adjusting scenarios to deal with missing support. However, this issue of Player Paraphernalia presents another option, allowing traditionally non-spell casting class access to a limited number of either arcane or divine spells through the use of a series of new feats and optional rules regarding spell-casting for non-spell-casters.

215815.name: Hive Hill
215815.description:
From the introduction:

Hive Hill is appropriate for parties of characters controlling at least one Grade 2 MajiMonster each. You can alter the difficulty by changing the level or Grade of the MajiMonsters present, or by including more or fewer MajiMonsters total.
...
In this scene, a hill protruding from the land is abuzz with Beetallions - groups of bee-like MajiMonsters that have turned the hill’s hollow interior into their hive. In addition to finding the Monsters for a wild encounter, the party can unearth a long-dead maji for a chance to find some treasure.

User summary:

Distributed with three accompanying PNG files (high resolution maps).

215817.description: Catacombs & Castles: Siege Defender contains the stretch goals from the Catacombs & Castles Kickstarter campaign, and its first edition is effectively a backer-exclusive expansion, offering a number of new heroes, lords, minions, and abilities.
215817.name: Catacombs & Castles: Siege Defender

215818.description: Keystones & Keeps is an expansion for Catacombs & Castles, which provides a pitted board (with configurable pits: there are 6 different types), and a number of heroes for both teams.
215818.name: Keystones & Keeps

215819.name: Winter Eternal Adventure Guide: 8 Cities
215819.description:
From publisher blurb:

The cities on Ehlerrac are busy, over-crowded and dangerous. Crime, monsters, the cold and underground organisations threaten the lives of citizens. There are also beauty and tranquillity to be found on the busy streets. People who are ready to help and those who live to protect.
This book covers life in the cities of Winter Eternal. It offers information on new elements to add to the adventure, from a postal service, to a fire brigade and a national sport. There are also new gear and monsters, adventure seeds and some new organisations that can be found in any city. Lastly there are two Savage tales to get a group started in the frozen world of Winter Eternal.

215820.description:
This Game 3 card was available to various game stores to be handed out during demos of the game.

This Ally carries the following ability:

Choose one:
Gain 2 [INFLUENCE] or All Heroes gain 1 [LIFE]
215820.name: Harry Potter: Hogwarts Battle – Ally: Seamus Finnigan

215821.name: Mare Nostrum: Empires - Mythical Beasts Expansion Tiles
215821.description:
The Mare Nostrum: Empires - Mythical Beasts Expansion Tiles are fully compatible with Mare Nostrum – Empires. These creatures feature new additions, such as:


The Kraken, which can help defend your triremes with floating Sea Fortresses.
The Sphinx, who provides her wisdom in the Trade round, allowing you to choose your Resources after you see what your opponents have to offer.
The Hydra, which attacks both foes and friends indiscriminately in battle.
The Manticore, which reduces your opponent's Legions, even as it bolsters your military strength.
The Mermaid, who guides your triremes, allowing them to move one additional Sea Area per turn.

215822.description:
This Game 1 card was handed out during GenCon 2016 and BGG.Con 2016.

This Spell carries the following ability:

Lose 1 [LIFE]; then draw two cards.
215822.name: Harry Potter: Hogwarts Battle – Spell: Sunshine Daisy, Butter Mellow, Turn This Stupid Fat Rat Yellow!

215823.name: Tireli'Cochon
215823.description:
Smash the piggy bank (Tireli'Cochon) and pick the treasure!

Spin the arrow and discover the action to be done: insert a coin in Tireli'Cochon, pull its tail or try to break it by beating it down with a hammer on its helmet! When the piggy bank explodes, run after the coins and try to pick up a maximum!

Casse la tirelire et récupère le trésor !

Tourne la flèche et découvre l’action à accomplir : glisse une pièce dans Tireli’Cochon, tire lui la queue ou essaye de le casser en tapant sur son casque ! Quand ta tirelire explose, cours après les pièces et essaye d’en ramasser un maximum !

rpgitemversion: L'Arsenale della Principessa Guerriera PDF version
215824.name: Arsenal of the Warrior Princess
215824.description:
From publisher blurb:

An archway and a tunnel delving deep into the side of the mountain, branded with the emblem of a forgotten empire...

And within, deathless guardians and treacherous traps await those who would obtain the weapons and treasures of that ancient realm!

Arsenal of the Warrior Princess is an oldschool adventure module for the 1981 edition of the world’s most famous fantasy roleplaying game, meant for a party of 4-6 characters of levels 4th-5th.

Arsenal of the Warrior Princess is designed to be compatible with most campaign settings and most rulesets that follow in that edition’s footsteps. It is also easily adaptable to most other fantasy roleplaying systems, and is an OSR Compatible product.

This is a classic, location-based adventure module: a hidden weapons research facility, dating back to an ancient, forgotten empire, and filled with treasures, dangers and monsters. The module includes four art handouts for players and a map of the dungeon, and is provided in a printer-friendly format to allow printing in folio.

215825.name: The Witch's Hideaway
215825.description:
From the introduction:

A Witch named Dewfinger has recently taken up residence at Raven’s Court Ruins, bringing with her a small group of bandits and Gnolls. The Witch is planning on sacrificing a child to complete a ritual granting her eternal youth. Meanwhile, a number of her bandits, lead by the Gnoll Prack have taken advantage of some locally grown herbs to create a powerful narcotic called Redflower, which they are selling to nearby villagers.

User summary:

For 2nd level characters.

215826.name: Enascentia: The Bridge of a Thousand Whispers
215826.description:
Publisher's blurb:

Nobody truly knows when the Bridge of Aalimshaasa was built; a cyclopean structure with many levels, it crosses the Valley of Fogs, in the Rallenok Mountains, providing safe passage through that insalubrious land. Some legends say it wasn't constructed by any Tribe, but that it appeared one night, the manifestation of Kami itself, others say it is the last remnant of a Lost Tribe. Whatever the truth, under its vaulted domes the travelers' steps echo in weird ways...

An Enascentia Savage Tale for 4-6 Novice adventurers.

215827.name: The World of Tyrth
215827.description:
A Homebrew Campaign Setting

From the introduction:

The World of Tyrth is like a king's feast. It contains everything your stomach might desire, from the finest Elven fruits to the heartiest dwarven roast meats. Golden dishes from the ancient city of Aneb'Tharan, Toldarian glazed pottery and silken table clothes from King's Watch all adorn the table. When all is said and done however, it only takes one bottle of Calmarnockian red to sour the entire meal.


- Ulitha Fendar, Historian of Falcon Haven

215828.description: Age of Steam Expansion: Ice Pack & Solar System features two maps for 3-5 players. Solar System is particularly hard to master as the city-planets revolve around the Sun, while in Ice Pack the map disappears round after round.
215828.name: Age of Steam Expansion: Ice Pack & Solar System

215829.description: Age of Steam Expansion: Cuba & Sicily has two new maps, with a new "Gunpowder" special action delivery to recognize the revolution in Cuba, which is a solitaire map. In the two-player map Sicily, the players struggle against the Cosa Nostra, a third virtual player.
215829.name: Age of Steam Expansion: Cuba & Sicily

215830.name: Cleric/Oracle Spells V (PRD)
215830.description:
From publisher blurb:

Echelon Reference Series: Cleric/Oracle Spells is a simple document that collects the cleric/oracle spell list, and all spells in it, for easy use. The spell lists are broken up by level and school, and the spells of each level are grouped together and organized by name.

This is a subset of the entire book, containing only the 5th-level cleric/oracle spells.

This is the PRD-Only version, containing information from the PRD.

215831.name: Cleric/Oracle Spells V (3PP)
215831.description:
From publisher blurb:

Echelon Reference Series: Cleric/Oracle Spells is a simple document that collects the cleric/oracle spell list, and all spells in it, for easy use. The spell lists are broken up by level and school, and the spells of each level are grouped together and organized by name.

This is a subset of the entire book, containing only the 5th-level cleric/oracle spells.

This is the 3pp+PRD version, containing information from the PRD and select third-party products.

rpgseries: GEO - Living Greyhawk Geoff Regional Adventure
215832.name: Runaway
215832.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Adventure

From the introduction:

Rumors in the night can be the beginning of fame and fortune for the unknown of Geoff.

An adventure for characters level 1 - 4.

rpgseries: GEO - Living Greyhawk Geoff Regional Adventure
215833.name: Cat and Mouse
215833.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Adventure

From the introduction:

Taking a walk on the "wild side" of Geoff.

An adventure for characters level 1 - 6.

rpgseries: GEO - Living Greyhawk Geoff Regional Adventure
215834.name: Gifts of the Fey Round 1: The Fey Woods
215834.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Adventure

From the introduction:

When a young boy is lost in the Fey Woods, the party must dare the capricious nature of he fey and journey to the Caves of Twilight Resplendent to negotiate with the Fey Queen. Are you willing to take on the faeries on their own terms?

An adventure for characters level 1 - 6.

rpgseries: GEO - Living Greyhawk Geoff Regional Adventure
215835.name: Gifts of the Fey Round 2: The Caves of Twilight Resplendent
215835.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Adventure

From the introduction:

When a young boy is lost in the Fey Woods, the party must dare the capricious nature of he fey and journey to the Caves of Twilight Resplendent to negotiate with the Fey Queen. Are you willing to take on the faeries on their own terms?

An adventure for characters level 1 - 6.

rpgseries: GEO - Living Greyhawk Geoff Regional Adventure
215836.name: The Gonfalon of Gyruff
215836.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Geoff Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

The years since Geoff fell to the giants stretch without end, and the refugees are giving way to despair and hopelessness. A bard's song sparks a quest to uncover an ancient banner, which could inspire a people to greatness. Will you dare the Contested Lands and the might of the giants to bring back a legend?

An adventure for characters level 1 - 6.

rpgseries: GEO - Living Greyhawk Geoff Regional Adventure
215837.name: A Little Bit of Wood
215837.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Geoff Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

The Army of Liberation is in need of a few good men to go find a few logs for them. Do you like travel? Do you like adventure? Then the Liberation Army may have a jog for you!

An adventure for characters level 1 - 6.

rpgseries: GEO - Living Greyhawk Geoff Regional Adventure
215838.name: The Return of the Grand Duke
215838.description:
A Two-Round Living Greyhawk Geoff Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

The Grand Duke of Geoff has returned to Hochoch, but foul magic may be afoot. Is the Grand Duke in danger? What nefarious plots swirl beneath the surface of the Court? Can you discover the true threat to the Grand Duke before war engulfs the Sheldomar Valley?

An adventure for characters level 1 - 6.

User summary:

Both rounds are published as a single PDF document.


Round 1: Maelstrom of Information
Round 2: Peril to the Grand Duchy

rpgseries: GEO - Living Greyhawk Geoff Regional Adventure
215839.name: Shadows of a Fallen Star
215839.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Geoff Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

Shadows flit from tree to tree and a new giant plot rises in the Dim Forest. Those once killed stand to walk again, and the White Stag leads you on a perilous path beneath the branches of the ancient wood.

An adventure for characters level 1 - 6.

215840.name: EXIT: Das Spiel – Die verbotene Burg
215840.description:
The castle is the highlight of the hike, but hardly have the hikers entered the old walls, when the squeaky doors close. Escape appears impossible — but strange hints may lead players in a new direction. Can they solve the riddles and find the way to freedom?

EXIT: Das Spiel – Die verbotene Burg is a puzzle game modeled after escape rooms.

215841.name: EXIT: Das Spiel – Die vergessene Insel
215841.description:
For those shipwrecked on the beach of this forgotten island, a chained boat is the only hope — but the mysterious owner has left puzzles over the whole island. Will the team solve them, free the boat, and escape?

EXIT: Das Spiel – Die vergessene Insel is a puzzle game modeled after escape rooms.

215842.name: EXIT: Das Spiel – Die Station im ewigen Eis
215842.description:
An alarm sounded in the eternal ice, so the polar station has been evacuated and foreclosed, but a small group of researchers has remained behind by mistake — and they have only one hour to find the code that will crack the lock program.

EXIT: Das Spiel – Die Station im ewigen Eis is a puzzle game modeled after escape rooms.

rpgseries: GEO - Living Greyhawk Geoff Regional Adventure
215843.name: Floating Down the River
215843.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Geoff Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

The Army of Liberation is on the move and has established a foothold on the west bank of the Javan River. The Giants won't sit still for this. We expect their counterstroke any day. Report to newly built Caer Rhiniog immediately!

An adventure for characters level 1 - 6.

rpgseries: GEO - Living Greyhawk Geoff Regional Adventure
215844.name: Expedition to the Barrier Peaks
215844.description:
A Two-Round Living Greyhawk Geoff Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

The distant Barrier Peaks hold promise and peril. Can you make your way across the giant's lands to their imposing heights? The chance for a new ally against the giants hangs by a wing and a prayer.

An adventure for characters level 3 - 10.

User summary:

A two-page PDF addendum ("Ruling on Grimlock Cohort") was subsequently published to clarify some aspects of possible outcomes of this scenario.

rpgseries: GEO - Living Greyhawk Geoff Regional Adventure
215845.name: Shhh...
215845.description:
A Two-Round Living Greyhawk Geoff Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

In the chaos of the fall of Gorna, things were left behind. Important things. Things that would make a person sneak back to Gorna. But the city is filled with giants and their thralls. Shhh... don't make a sound. They might hear you.

An adventure for characters level 3 - 8.

rpgseries: GEO - Living Greyhawk Geoff Regional Adventure
215846.name: A Pressing Matter
215846.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Geoff Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

The Grand Duchy's treasure is nearly empty, and the plates to mint new coins were lost when Geoff fell to the giants. A pound of gold in coins is worth more than a pound of bullion. "Those plates must be retrieved," says High Chancellor Colwyn. "The future of the army depends on it." He points to a map where the mint once stood, and your heart sinks.

An adventure for characters level 1 - 8.

rpgseries: GEO - Living Greyhawk Geoff Regional Adventure
215847.name: Feather and Foul
215847.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Geoff Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

The Griffon Banner unfurls and Grand Duke Owen leads the Army of Liberation south toward Preston. Glory and victory will soon be yours when you cast the Giants out of the Oytwood. All this may change if the sour expression on the face of Cadofyth Parn is any indication.

An adventure for characters level 1 - 8.

215848.name: Adaptable Worksheet for Snake in the Grass (Geoff)
rpgseries: GEO - Living Greyhawk Geoff Regional Adventure
215848.description:
From the introduction:

This worksheet will allow you to play ADP1-06: A Snake in the Grass as a Geoff regional tournament. The changes have been kept to a minimum to reduce workload on the DM, but are necessary for the appropriate flavor.

rpgseries: GEO - Living Greyhawk Geoff Regional Adventure
215849.name: Reverse Dungeon
215849.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Grand Duchy of Geoff Regional Interactive Adventure

From the introduction:

They say that in the Fires of Brewfest a person may see signs of the past - or even ways to change the future. The gnomes call upon adventurers to play a most unusual role.

A Grand Duchy of Geoff regional interactive adventure for APLs 2 - 16.

User summary:

This adventure is published in several documents:


GEO5-MM Reverse Dungeon (43-page PDF scenario)
Elven Characters (12-page PDF character sheets)
Hobgoblin Characters (12-page PDF character sheets)


Also, the adventure requires access to certain rules from Frostburn.

215850.name: Phalanxx: Charisma
215850.description: A pre-order bonus for Phalanxx, adding an extra expert starting card. The card gives you an additional, fourth, white "1" die that helps you fulfill card requirements.

215851.name: Monk Monastic Traditions
215851.description:
From the introduction:

At 3rd level, a monk gains the Monastic Tradition feature. Here are new options for that feature: the Way of the Kensei and the Way of Tranquility.

215852.name: A Scoundrel in the Deep
215852.description:
A collaborative storytelling game for two adults, a matchbox and an ashtray.

From the introduction:

One player will be a scavenging Scoundrel, their objective is to return to the surface from the ancient Tomb of the Deep, its legendary Ruby in their pouch.

The other player will be The Deep, their objective is to keep the Scoundrel in the tomb and deny them glory.

215853.name: King Arthur Pendragon (Edition 5.2)
215853.description:
From the back cover:

Capture the Spirit of Arthurian Legend!

Relive the grandeur and romance of the greatest of all legends—the story of King Arthur. Assume the role of a knight starting his career in the time of Uther Pendragon, undertaking quests and perilous adventures for your lord, for your lady-love, for the Church, or for your own glory. Win great renown with your laudable deeds and feats of arms, perhaps even winning the right to carve your name into the Round Table itself as the story of Arthur and Camelot unfolds around you.

With its innovative rules, including the distinctive traits and passions system designed to help you in determining your character's behavior under any circumstances, Pendragon provides a unique roleplaying experience laid out against perhaps the richest tapestry in Western literature.

This Edition 5.2 updates the redesigned and reorganized 5th Edition, and includes new material and rules changes from Greg Stafford, the creator of the original game and author of the 5th edition.


User summary:

Revised 2016 edition with new layout and cover/interior art licensed from Nosolorol Ediciones (Spanish-language publisher of Pendragon).

215854.name: Gods and Idols
215854.description:
Take the role of a newly ascended deity in Gods and Idols. Carve your place among the stars in an open, dynamic, and massive MMORTS universe. Command the powers of the cosmos, form alliances, and use your worshipers as instruments to further your goals.

Source: The Game Website.

215855.name: Operation: New Earth
215855.description:
Operation: New Earth is an intense sci-fi multiplayer strategy game in which you must command an advanced military facility to defend Earth from a hostile alien invasion. Create an alliance, gather resources, and unlock advanced technology to level up your stronghold!

Source: The Game Website.

215856.name: Filthy Lucre
215856.description:
Filthy Lucre is a tactical stealth HEIST game that gamers can play in single player and co-op, both split screen and online. With 15 missions across 5 locations, there are 30+ upgradable weapons and gadgets to...

Source: The Game Website.

215857.name: Pixel bomb! bomb!!
215857.description:
Long time ago, there was a beautiful Queen in Leroy Forest. The Queen was very narcissistic. She dressed up splendid every day and thought she was the fairest woman in the Forest. Every beautiful girl in the kingdom would lose good looks by the Queen's curse.

Source: The Developer Website.

215858.name: Strategy & Tactics: Dark Ages
215858.description:
Dark Ages is a turn-based strategy game set in the violent world of an alternate Middle Ages. Vikings against war elephants, musketeers against the Mongol cavalry, ancient phalanx legions against crusaders; the deadliest armies in history clashing in bloody war.

Source: The Developer Website.

215859.name: The Crypts of Anak Shaba VR
215859.description:
User Summary

The Crypts of Anak Shaba is a VR based swords and sorcery style adventure.

rpgseries: GEO - Living Greyhawk Geoff Regional Adventure
215860.name: A Wise Man's Son
215860.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Geoff Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

Are the rumors spread by Harold the Herald true? The village of Midwood run by a friendly giant? The twonsfolk uninterested in the war to reclaim Gyruff? Rubbish! But you should look into it anyway.

An adventure for characters level 3 - 10.

rpgseries: GEO - Living Greyhawk Geoff Regional Adventure
215861.name: Veins of Trust
215861.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Geoff Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

Far to the west at the foot of the mountains, the giants and their thralls have a mine where they dig deep for ore to feed the appetite of their enormous army. Collapse this mine and seal it up tight and maybe, just maybe, you cna weaken the giant's hold on Geoff.

rpgseries: GEO - Living Greyhawk Geoff Regional Adventure
215862.name: The Last of Nine
215862.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Geoff Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

Long ago, gnomish illuminators enchanted nine pickaxes as icons of Gnomish pride and power. When the giants came down from the mountains, the gnomes sent eight of these wonders to aid the Grand Duchy of Geoff. None returned to the hands of the gnomes. But the last one made was never sent against the giants. Its tale lies separate and apart from that of its brethren.

An adventure for characters level 1 - 8.

rpgseries: GEO - Living Greyhawk Geoff Regional Adventure
215863.name: A Flower for a Giant's Grave
215863.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Geoff Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

Perhaps you've had one ale too many because what you just overheard simply can't be true. Information this important could change the tide of the war. Yet warriors stouter than you have called it a fool's errand. Are you fools enough to delve deep into the Dim Forest on a rumor?

An adventure for characters level 1 - 8.

rpgseries: GEO - Living Greyhawk Geoff Regional Adventure
215864.name: One Good Turn Round 1
215864.description:
A Two-Round Living Greyhawk Geoff Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

The message from the Weeping Council to Grand Duke Owen was clear. "Leave was given thee to build the fortress named Caer Rhiniog, but thou has exceeded this concession. Further incursions into the Oytwood will not be tolerated unless thou canst prove thyself to be a true friend of the Olve. Send they best for a quest perilous and of great import. If they best succeed, thou and thine may wander freely in the Oyt. Should thy best fail, thou must surrender Preston to the Olve."

"Find me the best," Owen instructed High Seneschal Cuthalion Cuern, "We need the elves."

An adventure for characters level 3 - 10.

rpgseries: GEO - Living Greyhawk Geoff Regional Adventure
215865.name: One Good Turn Round 2
215865.description:
A Two-Round Living Greyhawk Geoff Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

The message from the Weeping Council to Grand Duke Owen was clear. "Leave was given thee to build the fortress named Caer Rhiniog, but thou has exceeded this concession. Further incursions into the Oytwood will not be tolerated unless thou canst prove thyself to be a true friend of the Olve. Send they best for a quest perilous and of great import. If they best succeed, thou and thine may wander freely in the Oyt. Should thy best fail, thou must surrender Preston to the Olve."

"Find me the best," Owen instructed High Seneschal Cuthalion Cuern, "We need the elves."

An adventure for characters level 3 - 10.

215866.name: We Become What We Behold
215866.description:
User Summary

Using a screen capture, you transmit images to social media. The characters react to these images, following fads, making funny comments, or becoming angry. Within 10 minutes, the game comes to a moral conclusion about images on social media.

Published by Nicky Case.

rpgseries: GEO - Living Greyhawk Geoff Regional Adventure
215867.name: Summer's Passing
215867.description:
A Two-Round Living Greyhawk Geoff Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

Arwyn Greenleaf, the Archdruid of Geoff, has embraced the Winter King. In the wake of his departure, the druids of the Old Faith gather on the Isle of Rhun and seek council form their Oracle. In the past, the Oracle's revelations have been shrouded in cryptic images and phrases open to interpretation. Now, the revelations of the Oracle have left little room for interpretation. Can the druids successfully locate the next Archdruid before the Balance is drastically altered?

An adventure for characters level 1 - 8.

User summary:

A two-page DOC Errata was subsequently issued for this scenario.

rpgseries: GEO - Living Greyhawk Geoff Regional Adventure
215868.name: Jailbreak
215868.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Geoff Regional Interactive

From the introduction:

When people die their spirit leaves their body and departs for one of the outer planes, where spirits become petitioners. Petitioners have no knowledge of their previous lives, including any levels in any classes and any spell-like and supernatural powers.

User summary:

This scenario was prepared only as a DOC without formatting.

rpgseries: GEO - Living Greyhawk Geoff Regional Adventure
215869.name: A Small-Knowing Soul
215869.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Geoff Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

Terror, confusion, mutilated bodies, and missing persons. A typical stroll in the lands of Gyruff.

A Geoff regional adventure for [character levels] 4 - 10 and Verse Two in the Dirge of Revenge and Loathing.

215870.name: WhatchamaCALLit
215870.description:
Description from the publisher:

A new concept in word games with the great advantage of involving all the players in the fun of the game all of the time. The game can be played by the whole family & by any number of players. The game centers around the planners or plans. These are the 'Crosswords' made up by all the players before the play actually begins. These planners are filled out by each player in crossword fashion on a particular theme or subject e.g. Film Stars, The Sea, Sport etc & the rest of the players have to find the words in these plans - the player with the most points being the winner. A game concept that can grow & even use tiles from other word games !

rpgseries: GEO - Living Greyhawk Geoff Regional Adventure
215871.name: Mourning of a Risen Sun
215871.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Geoff Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

The Ranger Lord Darlon Lea has turned his back on the powers of Geoff and pledged himself to the sylvan elves of the Dim Forest. The Army of Retribution and the Knights of the Watch wish to see justice done and his execution carried out, while Grand Duke Owen wants him to bend knee in fealty. But the outlaw lord hides in the Dim Forest, where powerful forces are at work. The Fades are spreading from Derelion and a mysterious falling star plunged into the Javan River last year. The key to Darlon’s past and the forest’s future resides with himself, the elusive Darlon Lea.

A Geoff regional adventure for APLs 4-10 and Verse Three of the Song of Fading Shadows.

rpgseries: GEO - Living Greyhawk Geoff Regional Adventure
215872.name: Curiosity Killed the Cat
215872.description:
A Continuous Two-Round Living Greyhawk Geoff Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

Father Winter's influence on the weather is a memory and anticipation grows that the liberation will soon resume. Before then, you travel to Garin's Field and indulge yourself at the Richfest celebration. Was that thunder you heard? Nah couldn't be! There’s not a cloud in the sky. Verse four of the Song of Cats and Caverns.

A continuous, two-round Geoff regional adventure for APLs 6-12.

215873.description:
B. - The novel is almost ready, missing only the finale.
J. - Right, it could take place in front of the gates of the Black Land.
H. - Black Land, John? We are in New England!
J. - You are killing the epic poetry Howard, Black Land and a horde of orcs.
B. - I got it! We can set the Novel in Transylvania, it's a classic! And a lot of garlic, everywhere.
H. - We already chose the United States.
B. - Romania or nothing!
J. - Middl ...
DLIN DLON!!
E. - I'm Poe, I solve problems!

This card is kept on the Idea Area and is available to players like other cards, but it can only be activated, not gathered. When a player activates the card, Discussion action starts: the player must propose a new card to substitute a Novel card. All players can join the decision assigning their strength to change it or not.
215873.name: The Vampire, the Elf & the Cthulhu: Edgar Allan Poe

215874.description: A set of four pairs of plastic feather tokens to replace the player meeples of the game. They were a Kickstarter exclusive add-on.
boardgameaccessory: The Vampire, the Elf & the Cthulhu
215874.name: The Vampire, the Elf & the Cthulhu: Feather Tokens

215875.name: Return to Freeport Part Three: Storming the Razor Caves
215875.description:
User summary:

Third part of the six-part Return to Freeport series.

215876.name: Fat City VR
215876.description:
User Summary

Fat City is a clever puzzle game with slim depth.

215877.name: Motor Strike: Immortal Legends
215877.description:
ver the past years, a lot of racing games have been released. However, in those games, action is usually relegated to a second level compared to the driving. Motor Strike: Immortal Legends comes to break the mold, being an action and racing game where the former is actually the star. You will have fun non-stop, trying to take down other players and minions as you drive through crazy tracks. In order to do that, you will have a selection of special skills and weapons at your disposal. Every car being unique and familiar, their abilities will make up for a totally different gameplay. Driving in reverse, being invisible or simply throwing a burst of missiles to your enemies had never been so fun!

Source: The Developer Website.

215878.name: The Little Acre
215878.description:
While searching for his father, Aidan travels to a strange new world. Lily - his heroic daughter - sets off after him. Fully voiced and with hand-drawn animations, The Little Acre is a lovingly crafted adventure developed by Pewter Games with Executive Producer Charles Cecil.

Source: The Developer Website.

215879.name: Mercenaries Saga 3
215879.description:
User Summary

Mercenaries Saga 3 is a Strategy game.

215880.name: Breakout Defense
215880.description:
User Summary

Breakout Defense is an Action game.

215881.name: Magnet Knights
215881.description:
User Summary

Magnet Knights is a platformer.

215882.name: Don Bradman Cricket 17
215882.description:
Don Bradman Cricket 17’s enriched career mode will allow players to begin their cricket careers at the local level, playing for teams in their chosen region before earning selection for domestic and international duty. Teams will also be dynamic throughout player's career saves rather than locked to a single line-up for the duration; other players will shift about as they retire, suffer injuries, slump in form, or get selected for higher levels of cricket. A new “Be a Pro” option will bring with it the ability to play through career mode as an existing player, and we’ll also have the option to play through career mode controlling the whole team.

Source: Wikipedia, "[en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Don_Bradman_Cricket_17 Don Bradman Cricket 17]", available under the CC-BY-SA License.

215883.name: FISH LAKE
215883.description:
Fish Lake focuses on fractions (including word problems) and teaches Objibwe culture.

Source: The Developer Website.

215884.name: Batman Miniature Game: Bane Crew
215884.description:
In the Batman Miniatures Game there are a couple of different versions of Bane to run your crew.

Arkham Origins Bane is a skilled fighter and a skilled planner. A danger to anyone that gets too close to him.

This Bane is often followed by a team of Mercenaries. These Mercs are well trained and very well armed. Bringing a selection of weaponry, they are all Veteran combatants and each also wears a Bulletproof Vest for protection.

This set contains four new miniatures and their associated character cards. Now you can build an army of mercenaries for the Batman Miniature Game.

215885.name: OneManVurgeR
215885.description:
User Summary

Mobile VR game OneManVurge now arrives to Steam platform.

215886.name: Moekuri: Adorable + Tactical SRPG
215886.description:
User Summary

151+ Creatures to try, over a solid grid-based tactical system.

215887.name: Monopoly: University of Michigan
215887.description:
Object. Buy Sell! "Pass GO and Collect $200!" Or"Go directly to Jail!" All the fun and excitement of Parker Brothers classic real estate trading game is here in this University of Michigan Edition. Buy famous alumni and coaches, utility companies, and properties of all types including President Gerald Ford and Coach Bo Schembechler. Increase the value of your properties by adding houses and hotels. Amass the greatest fortune in money and property and you're the winner!

Equipment. Game board 10 tokens Title Deed cards Package of playing money Chance cards. Community Chest cards Package of houses Package of hotels. A pair of dice

rpgseries: GEO - Living Greyhawk Geoff Regional Adventure
215888.name: A Break in the Silence
215888.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Geoff Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

The dwarves of the mountains have been silent for too long, and the concerns of the Dwur in Hochoch are growing. It is time for a journey to the lost stronghold of Deepholm.

A Geoff adventure for APLs 4-10, and Verse One of the Song of Earth and Stone.

215889.name: Acro Storm
215889.description:
Prepare to undertake a journey that's a bit more than it seems in the futuristic, interstellar world of competitive airbike racing! As you scream around tracks and dodge dangerous weaponry, always remember; in a competitor's life, there's always more than a prize at stake...

Source: The Developer Website.

rpgseries: GEO - Living Greyhawk Geoff Regional Adventure
215890.name: Debts Past Due
215890.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Geoff Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

A person’s past deeds haunt in ways never expected. Can you satisfy the bill collector?

A Living Greyhawk adventure set in the Grand Duchy of Geoff for Levels 1-8.

215891.name: Time Leap Paradise SUPER LIVE!
215891.description:
User Summary

Fully customize everything about the performance - the song, main vocalist and backup dancers, outfits and accessories, and more.

215892.name: BOTOLO
215892.description:
BOTOLO is a hybrid game of keepaway and king-of-the-hill. Steal the ball from your opponent and hold it in your zone to score points.

Source: The Game Website.

rpgseries: GEO - Living Greyhawk Geoff Regional Adventure
215893.name: Rite of Eternal Spring
215893.description:
A Two-Round Living Greyhawk Geoff Regional Adventure

From the introduction:


Long the Greenman slumbers deep beneath the ground.
The sun counts ten long winters ere his seed is found.


A Geoff regional adventure for APLs 4-10, and Verse 3 of the Song of the Gifts and Glamer.

215894.name: SugarMill
215894.description:
User Summary

During the 17th trip to the new indies when entering the Caribbean Sea, a storm awaits and takes your ship in its wrath.
After a few days waiting to see land, finally your crew and you find yourselves in this lush green island.

215895.name: Escape from Pleasure Planet
215895.description:
Escape from Pleasure Planet is a gay-themed science-fiction adventure game with bright colourful graphics, a fun story and character art by Joe Phillips.

Source: The Game Website.

215896.name: Lockdown: Stand Alone
215896.description:
No one knew that the greatest discovery in the history of man would also lead it to its very end. Lockdown: Stand Alone is a VR action game with horror elements offering an engaging sci-fi storyline, freedom of movement and a great deal of weapons.

Source: The Developer Website.

215897.name: LoveKami -Divinity Stage-
215897.description:
MoeNovel's exciting new original title, LoveKami -Divinity Stage-, debuts on Steam in English, bringing a fun and energetic tale filled with magic and music!

Source: The Developer Website.

215898.name: Crazy Oafish Ultra Blocks: Big Sale
215898.description:
User Summary

A massive sale is coming, which means unique bonus offers and huge discounts on amazing products that you've been dreaming of all year.

rpgseries: GEO - Living Greyhawk Geoff Regional Adventure
215899.name: Gifts of the Fey
215899.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Geoff Regional Introductory Adventure

From the introduction:

When a young boy is lost in the Fey Woods, the party must dare the capricious nature of the Fey and journey to the Caves of Twilight Resplendent to negotiate with the Fey Queen. Are you willing to take on the faeries on their own terms?

An introductory adventure set in the Grand Duchy of Geoff.

Being the First Verse of the Song of Gifts and Glamer.

User summary:

See also GEO1-03a: Gifts of the Fey Round 1: The Fey Woods and GEO1-03b: Gifts of the Fey Round 2: The Caves of Twilight Resplendent - this scenario is a re-worked version for 1st level characters.

rpgseries: GEO - Living Greyhawk Geoff Regional Adventure
215900.name: Strangers in the Night
215900.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Geoff Regional Introductory Adventure

From the introduction:

A small group of farmers outside of Hochoch is menaced in the night. Other "adventures" have laughed at the pittance the farmers have offered as a reward. Will the true heroes of answer the call and help the common folk?

rpgseries: GEO - Living Greyhawk Geoff Regional Adventure
215901.name: Lions in Hand
215901.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Geoff Regional Introductory Adventure

From the introduction:

The Army of Liberation is looking for freelance adventurers to help deliver low-priority messages. A bit of gold in your pocket, a few days in nice weather, how could there be any better work for adventurers such as yourselves?

A Geoff Regional Introductory Adventure for 1st-level characters.

rpgseries: GEO - Living Greyhawk Geoff Regional Adventure
215902.name: Fruit Off the Vine
215902.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Geoff Regional Introductory Adventure

From the introduction:

So you are ripe and ready to go adventuring? Well, the opportunity to travel and meet people can be available to you here in Geoff. With regional travel hot spots such as Hochoch, Preston, and the Oytwood diversity and variety are the spice an adventure’s life.

A Geoff regional introductory adventure for first
level characters.

215903.name: The Castle of the Cloud Giant Patriarch
rpgseries: The Castle of the Cloud Giant Patriarch
GEO - Living Greyhawk Geoff Regional Adventure
215903.description:
A Multiple Mini-Module Living Greyhawk Geoff Regional Delve

From the introduction:

The enormous castle floats ominously above the combined forces of Gyruff. As has happened so often in this conflict, the might of the Gyric wolfpack is used to infiltrate this fortress. What wonders does it hold? Whom does it hold? Can this behemoth be stopped before it lays waste to the armies and Hochoch?

Multiple mini-mods ranging from APLs 2 to 16.

User summary:

This series of "mini-modules" forms an interactive (semi-LARP) adventure.

215904.name: The Caverns
rpgseries: The Castle of the Cloud Giant Patriarch
GEO - Living Greyhawk Geoff Regional Adventure
215904.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Geoff Regional Delve Mini-Module

From the introduction:

The enormous castle floats ominously above the combined forces of Gyruff. As has happened so often in this conflict, the might of the Gyric wolfpack is used to infiltrate this fortress. What wonders does it hold? Whom does it hold? Can this behemoth be stopped before it lays waste to the armies and Hochoch?

215905.name: The Cistern
rpgseries: The Castle of the Cloud Giant Patriarch
GEO - Living Greyhawk Geoff Regional Adventure
215905.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Geoff Regional Delve Mini-Module

From the introduction:

The enormous castle floats ominously above the combined forces of Gyruff. As has happened so often in this conflict, the might of the Gyric wolfpack is used to infiltrate this fortress. What wonders does it hold? Whom does it hold? Can this behemoth be stopped before it lays waste to the armies and Hochoch?

215906.name: The Birdcage
rpgseries: The Castle of the Cloud Giant Patriarch
GEO - Living Greyhawk Geoff Regional Adventure
215906.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Geoff Regional Delve Mini-Module

From the introduction:

The enormous castle floats ominously above the combined forces of Gyruff. As has happened so often in this conflict, the might of the Gyric wolfpack is used to infiltrate this fortress. What wonders does it hold? Whom does it hold? Can this behemoth be stopped before it lays waste to the armies and Hochoch?

215907.name: The Wizard's Tower
rpgseries: The Castle of the Cloud Giant Patriarch
GEO - Living Greyhawk Geoff Regional Adventure
215907.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Geoff Regional Delve Mini-Module

From the introduction:

The enormous castle floats ominously above the combined forces of Gyruff. As has happened so often in this conflict, the might of the Gyric wolfpack is used to infiltrate this fortress. What wonders does it hold? Whom does it hold? Can this behemoth be stopped before it lays waste to the armies and Hochoch?

rpgseries: GEO - Living Greyhawk Geoff Regional Adventure
215908.name: From the Front
215908.description:
The Geoff Summer Campaign

A One-Round Living Greyhawk Grand Duchy of Geoff Regional Special Mission

From the introduction:

Following their victory at Pregmere, the various armies in the Grand Duchy of Geoff waited out the winter. Spring has come, and the snow and ice is a distant memory. Now it is time for the summer campaign. The Liberation of Geoff is at hand.

A Grand Duchy of Geoff regional special mission for APLs 2-12.

rpgseries: GEO - Living Greyhawk Geoff Regional Adventure
215909.name: Stormbreak
215909.description:
A Three-Round Living Greyhawk Grand Duchy of Geoff Regional Battle Interactive

From the introduction:

Overview and Specialized Rules for a Grand Duchy of Geoff regional battle interactive for APLs 2-16.

rpgseries: GEO - Living Greyhawk Geoff Regional Adventure
215910.name: A Home in the Downlands
215910.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Grand Duchy of Geoff Interactive Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

Last year, the Kingdom of Keoland bequeathed the lands south of Preston to the Grand Duchy of Geoff. Lying between the Stark Mounds on the west and the Javan on the east, the Downlands offer the potential of significant resources for the war against the giants. More than this, they offer a new home for thousands of Gyri in refugee camps around the Sheldomar Valley. All of their hopes and dreams ride on the ability of the Wolfpacks to brave the unknown reaches of the Downlands and find the Gyri a new place to call home.

A Grand Duchy of Geoff regional adventure for APLs 2 and 4.

rpgseries: GEO - Living Greyhawk Geoff Regional Adventure
215911.name: Blind Man's Bluff
215911.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Geoff Interactive Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

Last year, the Kingdom of Keoland bequeathed the lands south of Preston to the Grand Duchy of Geoff. Lying between the Stark Mounds on the west and the Javan on the east, the Downlands offer the potential of significant resources for the war against the giants. More than this, they offer a new home for thousands of Gyri in refugee camps around the Sheldomar Valley. All of their hopes and dreams ride on the ability of the Wolfpacks to brave the unknown reaches of the Downlands and find the Gyri a new place to call home.

A Grand Duchy of Geoff regional adventure for APLs 6 and 8.

rpgseries: GEO - Living Greyhawk Geoff Regional Adventure
215912.name: Nature's Own
215912.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Grand Duchy of Geoff Regional Interactive Adventure

From the introduction:

A Grand Duchy of Geoff regional interactive adventure for APLs 10-12.
...
Sierra Blackblade, the Regent of the Griffon Chair, has called the Gyri wolfpacks into service. Their mission is to locate a suitable place to build a new town in the Downlands. They are asked to rate the area on a set of criteria and suggest names for the town.

rpgseries: GEO - Living Greyhawk Geoff Regional Adventure
215913.name: Downlands Interactive
215913.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Geoff Regional Interactive Adventure

From the introduction:

You have been called to explore a new area of Geoff. Groups have been sent to different areas to explore possible city sites for a new Geoff Capital. An island paradise sounds perfect, but the natives may have other ideas.

A Geoff regional interactive for APLs 14-16.

215914.name: Arkin
215914.description:
https://twitter.com/Arkin_Game

From the cockpit of your Orion fighter, Arkin thrusts you into intense galactic dogfighting. You must tactically shift energy between shields, weapons, and engine while weaving and blasting away among asteroid fields and capital fleets.

215915.name: Sharp Flint
215915.description:
https://twitter.com/eatmeatgames

Set thousands of years ago, Sharp Flint is a game of prehistoric survival and exploration, challenging you to hunt low-poly fauna with spear and stone.

215916.name: Innerspace
215916.description:
Innerspace places you in control of a sharp-winged aircraft in a landscape far from our own, spherical worlds of ancient ruins and deep oceans and towering dieties for you to explore.

Source: The Developer Website.

215917.name: Scrum Card Game
215917.description:
The Scrum Card Game supports learners of agile framework SCRUM. Players act in a collaborative team environment during game play. Multiple teams are playing against each other. The objective of the game is that a team of players plan and work on a product's abstract working packages aiming to complete as many working packages as possible. The more functional the product gets the better the players perform in a team. Best team with most functional product wins. Teams with less functional product will lose. A team acts in collaboration while the teams have a competition against each other.

The card deck of the Scrum Card Game consists of four types of cards:

Story cards describing features the team wants to create for a product,
Event cards with positive, neutral, or negative impact on game play and progress,
Problem cards describing permanent obstacles on planned Stories, and
Solution cards helping players on occurred Problems.




By rolling two dice on each player's turn an amount of working hours per day spent on a working package is determined. This way if a full round (each player finishes an own turn) has finished a working day is simulated. Each three simulated days (which is called a Scrum Sprint) the players replan their work in a agile way. Game ends after three Scrum Sprints.

The card game is used so that players experience work in a simulated SCRUM sprint scenario. It allows reflection of many aspects and topics that happen in real life while working in
a SCRUM team, too.

215918.description:
Our intrepid adventurers have sailed on a journey, finding the hidden cave of a mythic monster. There are so many strange things there! The Captain allows the crew to search through the place and bring back to him what they have found, but by bluffing the Captain, they will try to keep the best part of the loot for themselves...

In Oh Captain!, an asymmetric game of changing roles, an adventurer must offer the loot cards they draw to the Captain, telling the Captain something about what the cards contain but not necessarily speaking truthfully. Indeed, some cursed objects can't be spoken of at all by the adventurers.

The Captain, who is safe from being attacked by objects, decides whether the crew member can keep the loot or not, and if the Captain turns down the offer, the crew member can decide to use an object against another adventurer. The latter player can overcome this by calling out a lie, winning or losing a coin based on who is right. The role of the Captain can be claimed by any adventurer who is richer than the Captain, and in the end the richest adventurer wins the game.
215918.name: Oh Captain!

215919.name: Oh! Sushi Game
215919.description:
It doesn't get more Japanese than this: 10 different games all using a set of pieces shaped like nigiri sushi! The Oh! Sushi Game is all the fun you'd expect and will help you built some skills which will prove very handy during your next trip to Japan among them, your use of chopsticks, your knowledge of a sushi menu, or the classic strategy game shogi (Japanese chess).

Oh! Sushi Game's basic gameplay is building Jenga-like towers (taking blocks stacked in a tower formation one by one and placing it on the topmost story. If the tower falls, you lose). But its creators have come up with several variations, including making a tower with chopsticks, picking your next piece using a die, or using the pieces as shogi pieces, dominoes, flash cards for memory games, and even as bullets for a variation of Russian roulette with wasabi.

215920.name: Lords of Spell and Stone
215920.description: Lords of Spell and Stone is a worker placement game set in medieval times. Players train their people, dig moats, build towers and walls, buy herbal components, and cast spells in an attempt to earn the most victory points at the end.

215921.name: Werewolves of London
videogameversion: Amstrad Spanish marked budget tape release
Spectrum Spanish marked budget tape release
215921.description:
Werewolves of London is a video game released in 1987 for the ZX Spectrum, Commodore 64 and the Amstrad CPC. It was released on cassette which has the Amstrad version on one side and the Spectrum version on the other (called "Flippy Flippy"). The game used the same engine as Viz Design's (consisting of Steve Howard and Paul Smith) other game Frankenstein Junior which was released by Codemasters in the same year. The game was released two years late (and largely unfinished) and was as a budget title, as intended publisher Ariolasoft went bankrupt (being released by Mastertronic. It was also released in Spain by Dro Soft.

The game is set in London and the plot is to kill each of eight members of an aristocratic family who put a curse on the main character, resulting in his daily transformation into a werewolf.

Gameplay
The game is played from a side-on 45-degree view, letting the player not only move left and right, but up and down. The character can also jump. The player starts off as a human who must roam the streets of London (including the London Underground and Hyde Park), and pick up items which will help the player in certain tasks. When the timer hits midnight, the player character transforms into a werewolf. The player must then track down each of the 8 enemy characters and kill, and optionally, eat their bodies, while avoiding being shot or captured by the police.

The game involved more strategy elements than the traditional 8-bit platform game, as the game changed mechanics and difficulty in response to the player's actions. For example, the more people that are attacked by the werewolf, the more active the police become. The Hyde Park location is locked during the night, and a ticket is needed to enter the subway (although rush gate can be done). When the Werewolf is sent to prison when 'touched' by a police officer with handcuffs. After transforms back to a human, the player is released or the player can escape by finding a crowbar to escape through the sewers (a torch is needed to see in the dark). Eating family members and NPC gives extra health, but being shot results in a constant health drop (in the form of a blood-bag icon). Finding bandages can stem the blood flow. If the blood-bag reaches empty, the game is over.

Source: Wikipedia, "[en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Werewolves_of_London_%28video_game%29 Werewolves of London (video game)]", available under the CC-BY-SA License.

215922.name: Defenders of the earth
215922.description:
From ZX Spectrum instructions

DEFENDERS OF THE EARTH is based on the very popular T.V. series of the same name. The Defenders, four super heroes from the Golden Age of Comics are:

FLASH GORDON - The Team Leader.
MANDRAKE THE MAGICIAN - A master of illusion.
LOTHAR - The strongest man in the world.
THE PHANTOM - Has the strength of ten tigers at his command.

They are aided and abetted by their pet mascot ZUFFY.

A Team - Invincible, Ready, Able and Willing to Defend the Earth at all times.

The courage and skill of the Defenders is put to the ultimate test by the evil of their arch enemy MING THE MERCILESS. He knows that only the Defenders stand in the way of his plan to be Master of the World. To stop them he abducts their children and takes them to the dark dungeons of his Fortress. He issues
a dire warning - Interfere and your children die.

A daring plan is conceived and put into action. Detection by the highly sophisticated intruder alarm would mean the instant death of the children and so Flash will enter the dark and dangerous fortress alone in the hope that he will be able to pass undetected through the intruder systems. Flash agrees to
summon the other Defenders to his aid should he need it. Lothar and the Phantom will use their incredible strength, Mandrake will use his occult magical powers to confound the forces of evil under Ming's command and even Zuffy offers his help in whatever way he can.

Flash, armed with a powerful handgun, transports into Ming's fortress with the future of the world in the balance.

215923.description: The first expansion for The King's Abbey. In this expansion, one player plays the Vikings, and is against all other "Abbey" players. This expansion uses a lot of the same mechanics as the base game, but the Viking player is building units to attack the other players in hopes to gain enough prestige points to overcome all other players.
215923.name: The King's Abbey: Lethal Steel

215924.name: Pilot 64
215924.description:
User Summary
Flight sumulator for Commodore 64, released in United Kingdom.

In the game you fly a Leander 454 propeller aircraft at night taking off from Norwich Airport.
The game has a classic cockpit view with loads of guages, and warning lights to monitor in order to make a safe flight.

215925.name: Neighborhood Watch: Savage Edition
215925.description:
From publisher blurb:

Neighborhood Watch is an adventure seed for use with Contagion Savage Edition

The world of Contagion is a dark and terrifying place. On the surface, it looks much like the world you and I live in. Just beneath that surface, in the shadows, rages an ancient con ict between supernatural factions who all seek dominion over the Earth and control over the souls of humanity. As a byproduct of this con ict, various factions have created inhuman monstrosities and released them into the world. While most average people are fortunate enough to never encounter such terrible creatures, those who do nd themselves facing things that reason cannot explain. Often, this ends tragically for the poor souls who have stumbled upon the foot soldiers of the war.

Neighborhood Watch centers on the aftermath of such an encounter. When a group of teenage girls try out an urban legend at a sleepover it ends in tragedy. A quiet neighborhood is rocked by the death of one of their children and the characters are left with questions that the authorities cannot answer.

215926.name: White Box Compendium: Player & Referee Options
215926.description:
From publisher blurb:

Endless Adventure Awaits!

White Box Compendium is compiles resources previously published in White Box Companion II, White Box Classics, White Box Demihumans, White Box Options, and White Box Chivalry into a single product, and adds several new options previously unreleased!

Fifteen Classes: Black Widow Elves, River Halflings, Sprites, and the new Tomb Robber!
Psychic Talents: Tap into the power of your character's psyche with these fast and simple rules!
Accolades and Honor: Knighthood isn't just for fighters anymore! Rules that allow any character to earn the prestige of chivlary, if they're willing to bear the responsibility!
Halfling Past Times: Halflings are known for their love of pints and pipes, but these uncanny gardeners have more than just a green thumb!
